bug.short_desc: sphinx searchd fails to start - FATAL: failed to create pid file...No such file or directory
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Upon reboot searchd may fail with: FATAL: failed to create pid file '/var/run/sphinx/searchd.pid': No such file or directory
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): sphinx-2.2.11-1.fc26.x86_64
How reproducible: Upon system reboot
Additional info:
Problem was caused by incorrect tmpfiles.d configuration "sphinx.conf". Temporary workaround until sphinx-2.2.11-2 is available will be to either backout to previous version "dnf downgrade sphinx" or simply edit:
/usr/lib/tmpfiles.d/sphinx.conf
and replace contents of file with the following line: d /run/sphinx 755 sphinx root -
